response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth more than $150 to us. Considering its value, I propose to sell it to you for $120. This price offers a great opportunity for you to benefit from its high-quality features at a reasonable cost. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.", "product_price": 120}
